input_text:
Job Title: Technical Lead

Location: United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
Company:At CodeMonk, we’re venturing into new territories, shaping the future of diverse and decentralised teams. We know finding the right talents and teams is a major challenge in today’s skills market. That’s why we’re creating a gateway for companies to access the best global talents and teams that are agile and match their business needs.
Through this platform, employers can efficiently and compliantly hire, manage, and pay flexible tech talents and teams anywhere in the world. While reducing costs significantly.
As the world of tech work increasingly embraces a remote-first approach, we’re dedicated to redefining employer-employee working relationships. Our mission is to empower employees with better pay, the opportunity to build world-changing tech solutions, increased work flexibility, and a promising career path.
Website:http://www.codemonk.ai
Skills: Python, R Programming, Scala, TensorFlow, PyTorch, Scikit-learn, CNNs, RNNs, GANs, Git, Data Preprocessing, Feature Engineering, Model Evaluation
Key Responsibilities: • Lead the design and development of machine learning models and algorithms to address complex business problems.• Architect scalable and maintainable machine learning solutions, ensuring high performance and reliability.• Collaborate with cross-functional teams to gather requirements and translate them into technical specifications.• Mentor and guide junior developers, providing technical expertise and support.• Conduct research and experimentation to identify innovative approaches and solutions.• Implement state-of-the-art machine learning techniques and algorithms to solve real-world problems.• Optimize model performance and ensure adherence to best practices and standards.• Stay updated with the latest advancements in machine learning and artificial intelligence.• Proficiency in programming languages such as Python, R, or Scala.• Strong understanding of machine learning algorithms and techniques.• Experience with machine learning libraries and frameworks such as TensorFlow, PyTorch, or scikit-learn.• Knowledge of data preprocessing, feature engineering, and model evaluation techniques.• Familiarity with deep learning architectures like CNNs, RNNs, and GANs.• Experience with version control systems like Git.• Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.• Ability to communicate effectively and collaborate with cross-functional teams.• Professional experience in machine learning development.
Why we think you'll love working with us:We are early stage and already a profitable venture.You will be part of the journey we’re on, so we offer equity options for important roles along with competitive salary.It will be an exciting stage to join as we are looking to raise our first substantial round this year.Beyond this, there’s plenty more that makes us a great place to work:We are fully remote company with flexible workingWe do not follow 9-5 and work when we are at our best30 days Paid Time OffRegular remote socials with global teamsRegular bounties and other campaigns for you to winPlus more rewards as we grow

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level

output_json.title: Technical Lead
output_json.summary: Lead the design and development of machine learning models and algorithms to address complex business problems.
job_responsibilities: Lead the design and development of machine learning models and algorithms
Architect scalable and maintainable machine learning solutions
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to gather requirements
Stay updated with advancements in machine learning and AI
benefits: Exciting stage to join with potential for substantial funding round
Fully remote company with flexible working hours
output_json.company_information: CodeMonk is a platform enabling companies to access global tech talents and teams for efficient, compliant hiring, management, and payment.

other.content: Company: At CodeMonk, we’re venturing into new territories, shaping the future of diverse and decentralised teams.

Early stage and profitable venture, equity options, competitive salary, exciting stage to join, fully remote company, flexible working hours, regular remote social events, bounties and campaigns for rewards.
